info.description: Transforming the Collection of Student Information (TCSI)
info.title: ITSP

tags.name: Students
tags.description: Access to the students API endpoint is limited to HEP and VET. (Access  to commonwealth_scholarships is only for HEP)

parameters.name: provider-String-timestamp
parameters.description: The String and timestamp when provider submits the request to DHS. (in UTC format with time zone in the ‘Z’ notation)

parameters.name: dhs-String-timestamp
parameters.description: The String and timestamp when DHS sends the request to DET. (in UTC format with time zone in the ‘Z’ notation)

parameters.name: organisation-id
parameters.description: The unique code of the education provider as supplied by DET when the organisation was registered as a provider

parameters.name: organisation-name
parameters.description: The name of the organisation as registered with DET.

parameters.name: provider-type
parameters.description: The provider type category for which the education provider is classified when registered with DET.

parameters.name: user-name
parameters.description: The login name of user who initiated the request using the Student Management System (SMS).

parameters.name: message-id
parameters.description: The unique identified that has been allocated by DHS for each of the request. (The message_id must be unique across all message submitted by the software for that organisation / education provider.)

parameters.name: api-key
parameters.description: The API Access Key obtained from DET confirming the consumer’s identity and authorisation to call the API endpoint. (This key will be exchanged manually. Keys will expire every 2 years.)

parameters.name: uid
parameters.description: Id of a specific resource

String-timestamp.description: The String and timestamp when the response is generated

message-id.description: The unique identifier that has been allocated by DHS to the submitted request.

parameters.name: provider-type
parameters.description: The provider type category for which the education provider is classified when registered with DET.

parameters.name: user-name
parameters.description: The login name of user who initiated the request using the Student Management System (SMS).

parameters.name: message-id
parameters.description: The unique identified that has been allocated by DHS for each of the request. (The message_id must be unique across all message submitted by the software for that organisation / education provider.)

parameters.name: api-key
parameters.description: The API Access Key obtained from DET confirming the consumer’s identity and authorisation to call the API endpoint. (This key will be exchanged manually. Keys will expire every 2 years.)

parameters.name: uid
parameters.description: Id of a specific record

parameters.name: provider-String-timestamp
parameters.description: The String and timestamp when provider submits the request to DHS. (in UTC format with time zone in the ‘Z’ notation)

parameters.name: dhs-String-timestamp
parameters.description: The String and timestamp when DHS sends the request to DET. (in UTC format with time zone in the ‘Z’ notation)

parameters.name: organisation-id
parameters.description: The unique code of the education provider as supplied by DET when the organisation was registered as a provider
